about_the_game:
Virnap is a 3D horror game planned to release in 2023 made primarily for VR that will get you into a nightmare chosen from its library of 40 nightmares for 20 different fears



Will the game be ported to PC?
Yes. We plan to make a PC release around a month after the game's VR release.

Will it have an options menu for lower-end computers?
It will have a highly customizable options menu for graphics that you can customize however you like for it to fit your computer.

When will it release?
We will release a free demo on Steam around mid to late 2023. And a full release in late 2023 or 2024.

Which fears will it contain?
Here are some examples of the phobias contained in the game:

Arachnophobia (Fear of Spiders)
Scopophobia (Fear of Being Watched or Stared At)
Nyctophobia (Fear of Darkness)
Acrophobia (Fear of Heights)
Cynophobia (Fear of Dogs)
Entomophobia (Fear of Insects)
Claustrophobia (Fear of Enclosed Spaces)
Pteromerhanophobia (Fear of Flying)
Somniphobia (Fear of Sleeping)

Of course, these are not all. Right now the game is on its early development right now.
